description:
Experience the power of the Zero G Tour, a four-buckle ski boot for intermediate to advanced backcountry skiers. With an uber-wide 55-degree range of motion and lightweight shell, gliding up the skin track feels like a breeze. And yet, when you lock down the buckles for the descent, the 110 flex turns this boot into a great downhill performer.

  • Polyurethane shell and polypropylene cuff, makes for a stiff but lightweight boot
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 55 degrees for a natural and effortless movement
  • Mobility Cuff System offers a Double blocking system that increases performance, stability, and safety
  • The C.A.S. Shell has an anatomical shape that matches the shape of the foot
  • 45mm Powerstrap securely tensions the cuff
  • 4 lightweight alloy buckles that catch when loosened for walk mode
  • Forward lean adjustment of 12 or 13 degrees
name: Tecnica Zero G Tour Ski Boots - Men's
